titleStmt.title: The last will and testament of the late renowned Cardinal Mazarini, deceased February 27, 1660 together with some historical remarques of his life.
Testament du cardinal Mazarin. English
titleStmt.author: Mazarin, Jules, 1602-1661.
Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Lillicrap for William Gilbertson ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Testament du cardinal Mazarin.
"Some historical remarqves" has special t.p. and is dated 1664.
The translation of the will and the authorship of the Remarques have been ascribed to James Howell. Cf. Vann, W.H. Notes on the writings of James Howell, 1924, p. 63-64.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
